description: Please complete the following questionnaire about your health. Your answers will help us provide the best care for you. If you have any questions, please ask a staff member.

sectionfields.fieldlabeltext: Do you have high blood pressure or take medications to control your blood pressure?
Have you had a heart attack?
Was it in the past 12 months?
Do you suffer from chest pains or chest tightness?
Does it occur when you are resting?
Does it occur when you are exerting yourself?
Have you been told you have angina?
Do you feel short of breath when you are resting or with light activity?
Do you get short of breath after one flight of stairs?
Have you had cardiac bypass surgery or had heart stents inserted?
Was it in the past 12 months?
Have you ever been treated for or been told you have heart failure?
Have you ever been treated for or been told you have pulmonary hypertension?
Do you ever wake at night gasping for breath for no reason?
Are you known to have a heart murmur, a problem with the valves in your heart, or had a valve replacement?
Do you suffer from palpitations or been told you have an irregular heartbeat?
Do you have a pacemaker?
Do you have an implantable defibrillator (a more complex form of pacemaker which can deliver shocks)?
Do you suffer from dizziness or blackouts?
Do you have asthma or chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD)?
If you have asthma, do you have more than one attack per month?
If you have COPD, have you needed antibiotics +/- steroid tablets more than 3 times in the last year?
Do you use home nebulisers?
Do you use home oxygen?
Have you been admitted to hospital because of your breathing in the past year?
Have you been admitted to an intensive care unit because of your breathing in the past?
Do you have any other breathing/lung conditions (eg lung fibrosis or asbestos lung disease)?
Please specify:
Have you been told you snore heavily at night?
Have you been told you seem to stop breathing during the night?
Do you drop off to sleep frequently during the day or get regular headaches?
Have you been told you have obstructive sleep apnoea (OSA)?
Do you use a CPAP mask at night?

formsections.title: 3. Diabetes, kidney, liver and thyroid problems

sectionfields.fieldlabeltext: Are you diabetic requiring medication?
If Yes, select
Is your diabetes well controlled?
What has been your average daytime BM in last 2 weeks if you measure it?
Do you have a history of diabetic ketoacidosis (very high blood sugar needing hospital admission) or frequent hypoglycaemic (low blood sugar) episodes?
Do you have any kidney or urinary problems?
Are you on kidney dialysis?
Do you have an overactive or underactive thyroid gland in your neck
Do you have any liver problems requiring treatment?
Do you have a blood disorder or a condition that makes you prone to bleeding/bruising easily?
If Yes, please select
Please specify
Are you known to be anaemic?
Have you had a blood clot in your lung or legs?
Would you accept a transfusion of blood if your surgeon thinks it would be in your best interest?

formsections.title: 5. Brain, nerve, muscle and bone problems

sectionfields.fieldlabeltext: Have you ever had a stroke or mini stroke?
Was it within the past 6 months
Do you have epilepsy?
Is it difficult to control e.g. more than 1 fit per month?
Do you have any other brain/nerve/muscle disease?
If Yes, please select
Please specify
Have you been diagnosed with dementia?
Are you currently being treated for any mental health condition?
If yes, please specify
Have you been told you have rheumatoid arthritis (different to osteoarthritis)?
Do you have any restrictions of your neck or jaw movement?
Have you or a family member had any problems with or allergic or anaphylactic reactions to general anaesthetics
Has an anaesthetist told you that your airway was difficult to manage or it was difficult to pass a breathing tube?
Are you seen in a chronic pain clinic?
Do you take regular morphine or oxycodone or similar?
Have had problems with pain postoperatively in the past?
Are you receiving treatment from another hospital or have any other significant medical conditions not already mentioned?
If yes, please give details
Do you have a syndromic / congenital condition (eg achondroplasia, mucopolysaccharidosis, Down’s syndrome) not already mentioned?
If yes, please give details
Please select any of the following medications you are taking?
sectionfields.optionliststatement: select 'Contraceptive pills'  as optionval, 'Contraceptive pills'  as optiontext union select 'Hormone Replacement Therapy (HRT)'  as optionval, 'Hormone Replacement Therapy (HRT)'  as optiontext union select 'Aspirin'  as optionval, 'Aspirin'  as optiontext union select 'Warfarin'  as optionval, 'Warfarin'  as optiontext union select 'Clopidogrel'  as optionval, 'Clopidogrel'  as optiontext union select 'Dabigitran'  as optionval, 'Dabigitran'  as optiontext union select 'Apixiban'  as optionval, 'Apixiban'  as optiontext union select 'Rivaroxiban'  as optionval, 'Rivaroxiban'  as optiontext

sectionfields.fieldlabeltext: Are you happy for us to view your GP medication records (Summary Care Record)?
List all other medications you are taking or write "NONE"
List all Drug Allergies you are having or write "NONE"
List all other Allergies you are having or write "NONE"
